title: Fizz is really unfun to play against
body:
Whenever i see him on the other team i get a slight urge to dodge.

EDIT: Im NOT saying hes overpowered whatsoever, hes just unfun to play against. This was also a semi vent, semi opinion post. Idk why people payed attention to this.

replies.body:
To be fair, most assassins are that way.

The only assassin I find quite FAIR to play against is, surprisingly, Zed, even though I hate his kit.

Zed is only fair if you counter him. A good Zed is impossible to gank, never has trouble with cooldowns or resource management, and can freeze or shove wave pretty easily. When I play someone like Annie, sure I basically just win the game by default, but anyone else and he just Q farms and evades any gank with his shadows. Then he roams or takes a turret in half a second. He's one of those champions that is either extremely oppressive or useless depending on who you use, and I think that's one of the worst things that can happen to balancing.
Well you can fairly easily dodge most of his burst if you can just evade his second shuriken.
Which is not precisely easy against good Zeds. It has a fast travel time :/
He's only impossible to gank if he doesn't harass with w. If he doesn't use w to harass, he tickles in lane.
The best way to have a good bit of both worlds is to never poke with your w if you're pushed past river.

I also find Talon fair to play against. He is really predictable most of the times to be honest. I know I'm the only one thinking this but if anything then they made his kit weaker than it was(unless he uses it for roaming, then it's better)
It's when he roams. He can hop over a wall and delete a squishy before his invisibility even runs out.

Which is fair because that's the point of assassins and it's fair that a squishy carry cannot do much against it alone. Also the mid should follow up that Talon if possible when he roams. And the support should do a good enough job to screw that Talon combo up.(You may say that support has no time to react but he certainly does when the mid follows Talon up and also pings before that Talon is missing). The same way you can just bring out many other assassins and why they are stupid. Ekko? If you can't see him and he casts his W, it's actually a bit hard to doge it i he predicted well and you are low mobility. Sure you see him coming but if anything goes wrong just R to safety and get healed. Zed? Wait enemies to use skillshot and only use your shadows after that to dodge the cc. Afterwards with ult do some sick stuff. Seriously you can go on and on with assassins. Some are superior at roaming, some not, but each of them has some kind of weakness atleast. For Talon it is what it used to be. If he goes in he must get that carry down because a normal teamcomp makes it no way out once he engages. Then again, I'm just a silverscrub last season G5 so I'm not experienced at this game and I might be wrong.

My point here is that the squishy can't do _anything_. Talon literally can't be seen. They won't know he's there until they see grey. Sure, if you can get the jump on a squishy, you probably deserve the kill, but Talon can hop over terrain! Invisible!

He cannot actually perform the hop while invisible, the moment he starts his jump his ultimate stops and he becomes visible. You could ulti halfway the jump but then the blades would make it obvious what's happening. I'm not sure I agree he is the most fair, but he's definitely not half as bad as some of the others.
Oh I see, so that's how it works. I guess his jumping isn't so op, but it still irks me every time a Talon gets caught 1v4 in our jg but just casually skips away...
Talon literally can't be seen... *Looks at Shaco*

Talon is easly spot if ur team :

1. look at the map
2. use these : {{item:3340}} {{item:2055}} 
3. use ping

Ya gimme that FoW removal hack. Cause playing back while he's basing each time makes you lose the lane by default.
??? i don't understand... can u make it clearer ?

How to counter Fizz: 

MR Glyphs
AP Quints
MR Marks
Scaling HP Seals

Play Fiddlesticks

last hit with auto attacks

use Drain on Fizz everytime he all ins you

Fizz's troll pole won't break Drain tether so you can still hurt him while he's supposed to be immune

Get fed off of Fizz

Stay relevant all game as you lock him down for your team with fear and silence so he can't get away
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

**Remembers the days of Tank Fizz and Level 2 100-0s**

I'll take the current one thank you.
He's unfunk to play against, rito give fizz an afro.

I agree, he has one of the highest gapclosers in game using only basic abilities, and he still has enough dmg to kill people after that, plus his fish is almost impossible to dodge at 600+ range (which is where the squishies would be)

> [{quoted}](name=BananaSlayerAMO,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x6Z5QZvI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-24T06:50:54.664+0000)
>
> I agree, he has one of the highest gapclosers in game using only basic abilities, and he still has enough dmg to kill people after that, plus his fish is almost impossible to dodge at 600+ range (which is where the squishies would be)

You know they fixed it right? The fish hitbox is insanely small now.
Youre probably gonna hit a max range fish maybe once a game

The fish eruption radius is 200 - 450 depending on distance. If you compare to other champs, {{champion:101}} W is 200, {{champion:54}} ult is 300, and {{champion:79}} ult is 400

So I'd say Fizz's hitbox is pretty large.

> [{quoted}](name=BananaSlayerAMO,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x6Z5QZvI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-24T12:54:01.474+0000)

> 
> So I'd say Fizz's hitbox is pretty large.

The eruption is that size.
The pickup size is smaller. (The hitbox that attaches to you.)
you never played against a zyra ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

did you have fun playing against evelynn main ?( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Are you implying evelynn isn't cancer?
stop saying cancer to describe things...it makes no sense.

> [{quoted}](name=SoryInAdvance,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x6Z5QZvI,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-24T15:28:21.131+0000)
>
> stop saying cancer to describe things...it makes no sense.

It makes perfect sense, it described what I wanted to say in a manner others understand(and you know perfectly well what I'm talking about and what others talk about when they call something "cancer"), which is kind of the point when saying anything really.

Cancer is a rapid division of abnormal cells. There is no interpretation of the word that can be used to convey hatred for something that is annoying...especially evelynn. I think the only way to use it like this would be some menace that is actually overtaking everything and causing serious problems..evelynn is an insignificant blip compared to half of the champions in this game.
do you wanna catch cancer? its used in the sense that ppl call malzahar aids. get internet literate please.
its called "space aids" because it goes to one and then jumps to another and so on just as aids does through transition. The way people use cancer is not relevant at all.
your thought process is why you were downvoted, please rethink your opinion.

please 2 downvotes is completely irrelevant. Thats just some losers that sit in their basement all day i could care less about their opinions. Maybe you should come up with an actual argument as to why you disagree because so far what i've said has been 100% correct by definition.
dude just take your literate self elsewhere if you cant comprehend a fact about the internet.
Instead she goes support and still one shots ur whole team
Zyra dies to a strong breeze and has no gap closers, though. easy to counter
zyra is still annoying in lane ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) . i think riot need to changer all her abillity scaling to true damage . It would be less annoying .
I really don't think Zyra is that strong, idk
and make her gain damage from using abilitys, you are a genius, riot hire this man.
Fizz has a lot of counterplay, he's just really good at punishing mistakes.
this could be said about every cancer champion out there though.
In your opinion, who are the cancer champions that you speak of?
anything with too much mobility and too reliable damage, lee, yasuo, camille, fiora and zed come to mind.
So anything that you try to duel one on one and can't lock them down is cancer?
pretty much  yeah
Well, then you need to get better at the game and stop playing like an idiot. You are trying to duel assassins and duelists one on one. That is your problem.
when a bronze player tells you to git gud lmao

he's kinda right though. duelists/assassins are supposed to 1v1 but tend to suck in teamfights unless they fulfill a few conditions since they are squishy, lack range, and lack high and reliable AoE damage. 

Probably the worst offender of this is tryndamere and as such he's only useful when he splitpushes and forces a 1v1 or 1v2. In teamfights, he just e's in and hopes the enemy to peel for whatever high health target he's aiming.
